Test Name: BCR/ABL1 Qualitative Diagnostic Assay with Reflex to BCR/ABL1 P190/P210 Quantitative Assay
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow cells
Purpose: To detect BCR/ABL1 fusion transcripts and, if present, quantify BCR/ABL1 P190 or P210 transcripts for diagnosis and monitoring of BCR-ABL positive leukemias.
Equipment: Real-time PCR machine, nucleic acid extraction kit, BCR/ABL1 qualitative and quantitative assay kits
